amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the VA's Office of Congressional and Legislative Affairs (OCLA) by $1.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that not more than $4,400,000 of the funds provided may be used for the Office of Congressional and Legislative Affairs, and the amount provided under that heading is reduced by $1.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Roe (TN).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
